name: v3.0.1 add a message to WrongViewHolderException
body:
Change list:
- https://github.com/vivchar/RendererRecyclerViewAdapter/pull/55 added a message to WrongViewHolderException (thanks @fastholf)

name: v3.0.0 ListAdapter
v2.8.0 - ViewPool support
body:
Change list:

- add [ViewPool](https://proandroiddev.com/optimizing-nested-recyclerview-a9b7830a4ba7) support.

FYI: see the [wiki page](https://github.com/vivchar/RendererRecyclerViewAdapter/wiki/Quick-start-with-ViewPool) for some documentation

name: v2.7.0 - migration to AndroidX
v2.6.0 - SaveInstanceState
body:
Change list:
- added onSave and onRestoreInstanceState methods to support device orientation changed.

name: v2.5.1 - Context argument
body:
Change list:
- No need to put Context argument into Adapter, this constructor marked as Deprecated.

name: v2.5.0 - New methods
v2.4.1 - Bug fixing
body:
Change list:
* fixed NullPointerException.

name: v2.4.0 - New ViewFinder methods
v2.3.1 - ListUpdateCallback
body:
Change list:
* added ability to set ListUpdateCallback when you use DiffUtil.

name: v2.3.0 - CompositeViewBinder
v2.2.0 - ViewBinder
body:
Change list:
* added new version of ViewRenderer without ViewHolder - the ViewBinder;

name: v2.1.0 - ViewHolder, ViewState rework
v2.0.0 - No need more a TYPE
body:
Changes:
- remove TYPEs of Models;
- rename ItemModel to ViewModel.

UPD: if you use the ViewState in dynamic list - please use v2.1.0.

name: v1.4.1 - Bug fixing release
v1.4.0 - LoadMore support
body:
Change list:
- add LoadMore support;
- add ItemModel param to ViewState.

UPD: if you use the ViewState in dynamic list - please use v2.1.0.

name: v1.3.0 - View States Support
v1.2.4 - Bug fixing release
body:
Change list:
- fix the CompositeViewRenderer bug

name: v1.2.3 - Bug fixing release
body:
Change list:
- fix a problem with composite item.

v1.2.1 - Composite Items optimisations
v1.2.0 - Composite Items Support

v1.0.10 - Migration to the Maven Central
body:
Change list:
- migration to the Maven Central (For previous versions you should to use the Jitpack)
